Research.title: Areas of
Research.subtitle: Exploring the boundaries of physics and computation to solve tomorrow's energy challenges.

equilibrium.title: Equilibrium and Non-Equilibrium Thermodynamics
equilibrium.description: Analysis of systems in thermal equilibrium and irreversible processes, studying entropy generation and fluctuations at micro and nanometric scales.

patterns.title: Pattern Recognition
patterns.description: Application of machine learning algorithms and neural networks to identify complex thermal patterns and predict energy behaviors.

renewable.title: Renewable Energies
renewable.description: Research in clean energy technologies, optimization of solar and wind systems, and development of materials for efficient energy storage.

heat.title: Heat Transfer
heat.description: Study of conduction, convection, and thermal radiation mechanisms in complex systems, with applications in advanced refrigeration and heat exchangers.
